@lissa - The Crack is in the iso itself.  Just mount Generations like you are going to install it, go to 'My Computer' and right click the Generations icon and click Explore, Find the folder that says Crack and then copy the file in that over to your Electronic Arts\Sims 3\Game\Bin folder.

Anyone that's having trouble ..

You do not have to have all the Expansions Just the Original & Generations (These are necessaries to play) Mount Images and set up will come up. All Expansions in between are optional. Ok Install the ones you want but make sure keep order 1-8 Aka don't do 8 then do 2 etc, Once you have done installing 
Open the Generations theres a folder called Crack Copy the bottom 2 (Dont copy the Keygen but everything else) Extract/Move To '' My Computer/ C:/Program Files/Electronic Arts/Sims 3/Game/Bin '' Paste it and Replace Original,, 

Move the Mod/Packages to Electronic arts/Game
And Paste (Its the Same Path as the Crack but you only stop at Sims 3.

So I followed the instructions on the readme and now when I get to the launcher and press the play button it gives says "no game disc found" regardless of having the image mounted in daemontools. Whats going on?

Crack from Disk 8\Crack folder goes to Sims 3 folder, not generations.
C:\Program Files\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\Game\Bin\TS3W.exe (+TSLHost.dll)
rld-s3genk.exe is  a keygen and should not be in this folder. as the keygen is in the archive root.
Install all games from 1 to 8 IN ORDER.

Use Correct Keygens and serial.txt files

AFter installing Game 8 (Generations) goto the Crack folder on Disk 8 Generations
and copy TS3W.exe and TSLHost.dll NOT rld-s3genk.exe to 
C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\Game\Bin

If you copy to...
C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3 Generations\Game\Bin = disk authoriziation fail


Use the Launcher (will get an error which is Crack Normal) or Run
C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\The Sims 3\Game\Bin\TS3.exe to skip launcher.


Mods\packages\NRass files this cause a dialog error to popup in the background leaving you with a black screen (apparent freeze) alt tab to dismiss error.
I deleted these 3rd party mod files.

Mods\packages\NoMosaicWA.package causes graphical glitches, missing icons in bubbles, bubbles wrong size. I deleted this 3rd party mod. (Mod removes the blurry private areas in shower, etc)

nointro.package and Both M4Rk13 seem ok.

Store Updates seem ok, when creating a sim, icons show which expansion provides the items, folder icons represent items the store updates provide.

Downloaded Content when installed, becomes uninstalled when you quit the launcher or run the game.
I removed all mods and custom content except a single Downloaded file and it still did not work. I can only assume the crack breaks Downloaded Content completely.

Hope this detail helps out.
